resources.name: Greycat ‘ASD’ Refinery Suit
resources.title: Greycat ‘ASD’ Refinery Suit
resources.subtitle: Subscribers Store
resources.excerpt:
Thanks to its unique ThermoWeave material, Greycat’s Refinery suit provides complete fire and heat protection for working in challenging environments.

This flair item is temporarily delayed and will be available in an upcoming patch.
resources.label: Greycat ‘ASD’ Refinery Suit

resources.name: Valakkar Specimen Tank
resources.title: Valakkar Specimen Tank
resources.subtitle: Subscribers Store
resources.excerpt:
Collected by the scientists at ASD, this specimen tank holds a well-preserved juvenile valakkar. Once used in various research experiments, the valakkar inside is now ready to serve as a biological curio and decorative conversation piece.

This flair item is temporarily delayed and will be available in an upcoming patch.
resources.label: Valakkar Specimen Tank

resources.name: ASD Labs Collection
resources.title: ASD Labs Collection
resources.subtitle: Subscribers Store
resources.excerpt:
This pack contains both the Greycat Refinery suit and Valakkar Specimen Tank, each recovered from the depths of the ASD labs in Pyro.

These flair items are temporarily delayed and will be available in an upcoming patch.
resources.label: ASD Labs Collection

resources.name: Cuddly Cargo Collection
resources.title: Cuddly Cargo Collection
resources.subtitle: Subscribers Store
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt:
A haul you can hug. Includes UDM, Red Wing, Covalex, T.A.B.A., Ling Family, and Interstellar Transport Guild cargo-box plushies.

*This flair item is temporarily delayed and will be available in an upcoming patch.*
resources.label: Cuddly Cargo Collection

resources.name: Decorative Cargo Collection
resources.title: Decorative Cargo Collection
resources.subtitle: Subscribers Store
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt:
There's no need for a tractor beam to move these cargo containers. Includes finely detailed models of UDM, Red Wing, Covalex, T.A.B.A., Ling Family, and Interstellar Transport Guild cargo boxes.

*This flair item is temporarily delayed and will be available in an upcoming patch.*
resources.label: Decorative Cargo Collection

resources.name: Cargo Collection Pack
resources.title: Cargo Collection Pack
resources.subtitle: Subscribers Store
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt:
This pack contains both the Cuddly and Decorative Cargo Collection Flair items. Includes UDM, Red Wing, Covalex, T.A.B.A., Ling Family, and Interstellar Transport Guild plushies and decorative cargo boxes.

*This flair item is temporarily delayed and will be available in an upcoming patch.*
resources.label: Cargo Collection Pack

resources.name: ASD Bomber Jacket
resources.title: ASD Bomber Jacket
resources.subtitle: Subscribers Store
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt:
Originally exclusive to ASD workers in the Biological Research Division, this synthetic leather jacket has the look, feel, and smell of the real thing. The company's logo is featured on the front and back.

_This flair item is temporarily delayed and will be available in an upcoming patch._
resources.label: ASD Bomber Jacket

resources.name: Irradiated Valakkar Diorama
resources.title: Irradiated Valakkar Diorama
resources.subtitle: Subscribers Store
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt:
Irradiated by toxic storms on Pyro I, the valakkar bursts from the ground in this decorative hangar diorama.

_This flair item is temporarily delayed and will be available in an upcoming patch._
resources.label: Irradiated Valakkar Diorama

resources.name: ASD Jacket & Irradiated Valakkar Diorama
resources.title: ASD Jacket & Irradiated Valakkar Diorama
resources.subtitle: Subscribers Store
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt:
Includes the in-game ASD Bomber Jacket and Irradiated Valakkar Diorama.

_This flair item is temporarily delayed and will be available in an upcoming patch._
resources.label: ASD Jacket & Irradiated Valakkar Diorama

resources.name: Idris-P T-Shirt
resources.title: Idris-P T-Shirt
resources.subtitle: Subscribers Store
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt:
Celebrate 80 years of the Idris-P with this limited-edition t-shirt, featuring a schematic-style image on the front and the Aegis Dynamics logo on the back.

*This item will be delivered in an upcoming patch*
resources.label: Idris-P T-Shirt

resources.name: Invictus Patch Collection
resources.title: Invictus Patch Collection
resources.subtitle: Subscribers Store
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt:
Mounted inside a beautiful display case, this collection features three patches honoring the naval bases used over the centuries to train recruits into brave starmen dedicated to defending Humanity.

*This item will be delivered in an upcoming patch*
resources.label: Invictus Patch Collection

resources.name: Invictus Launch Week 2955 Collection
resources.title: Invictus Launch Week 2955 Collection
resources.subtitle: Subscribers Store
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt:
Contains the Invictus Patch Collection with display case, Second Tevarin War Service Uniform (jacket & trousers), Idris-P t-shirt, and Gemini LH86 ‘Voyager Edition’ pistol.

*These items will be delivered in an upcoming patch*
resources.label: Invictus Launch Week 2955 Collection

resources.name: Wikelo Emporium Jacket
resources.title: Wikelo Emporium Jacket
resources.subtitle: Subscribers Store
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: This classic black bomber jacket features a neon design of the Collector and their emporium on the rear. In the words of Wikelo, “Super style! Supreme comfort!”
resources.label: Wikelo Emporium Jacket

resources.name: Wikelo Emporium Bust
resources.title: Wikelo Emporium Bust
resources.subtitle: Subscribers Store
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Bring the Collector’s Emporium to your hangar with this bust of Wikelo, who pilots will meet on their travels across the Pyro system.
resources.label: Wikelo Emporium Bust

resources.name: The Wikelo Emporium Pack
resources.title: The Wikelo Emporium Pack
resources.subtitle: Subscribers Store
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Both Wikelo Emporium Flair items in one place. Includes the Wikelo Emporium Bomber Jacket and Emporium Bust.
resources.label: The Wikelo Emporium Pack

resources.name: Big Winner T-Shirt
resources.title: Big Winner T-Shirt
resources.subtitle: Subscribers Store
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Featuring a stylized neon-green X on the front and the phrase ‘Big Winner!’ on the back, when you wear this t-shirt, everyone will know you're going places.
resources.label: Big Winner T-Shirt

resources.name: Hazardous Cargo Chair
resources.title: Hazardous Cargo Chair
resources.subtitle: Subscribers Store
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Rest your weary legs after a long day of hauling dangerous materials with this unique chair, upcycled from a repurposed hazardous-cargo box.
resources.label: Hazardous Cargo Chair

resources.name: Headhunters Carnifex ‘Lucky Break’ Armor Set
resources.title: Headhunters Carnifex ‘Lucky Break’ Armor Set
resources.subtitle: Subscribers Store
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Gear up like the Headhunters with a Stella-Fortuna twist. Includes ‘Lucky Break’ Deadhead helmet, deep-space undersuit, and full Carnifex armor.
resources.label: Headhunters Carnifex ‘Lucky Break’ Armor Set

resources.name: Party Hard Pack
resources.title: Party Hard Pack
resources.subtitle: Subscribers Store
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Includes gold-accented Carnifex Armor, Gemini C54 ‘Luckbringer’ SMG, Gemini LH86 ‘Luckbringer’ pistol, 2954 Luck’s Favor tankard, 2954 Tempt Fate tankard and a Big Winner T-Shirt with a Hazardous Cargo Chair.
resources.label: Party Hard Pack

resources.name: Red Heart Plushie Cushion Set
resources.title: Red Heart Plushie Cushion Set
resources.subtitle: Subscribers Store
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Huggable, lovable, and thoroughly squashable, this red heart plushie cushion will fill your heart with joy. This plush cushion set consists of a synthetic leather casing dyed with a passionate scarlet coloring.
resources.label: Red Heart Plushie Cushion Set
